## StateWithVariables type

Describes a named state that also contains some variables. These variables can be returned by state handlers later.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type StateWithVariables = HasTypeForState<typeof SETUP_VARIABLE_STATE> & {
    readonly stateName: string;
    readonly variables: Record<string, AnyCaseMatcherOrData>;
};
```
**References:** [HasTypeForState](./case-plugin-dsl-types.hastypeforstate.md)<!-- -->, [SETUP\_VARIABLE\_STATE](./case-plugin-dsl-types.setup_variable_state.md)<!-- -->, [AnyCaseMatcherOrData](./case-plugin-dsl-types.anycasematcherordata.md)
